entities.name: light
entities.description: The light mentioned is the one that Harry uses to read the message.

entities.name: wands
entities.description: The wands are lit behind Harry, providing him with light.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is the one who receives the message from Harry.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is a powerful object that contains a piece of Voldemort's soul.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who drank the potion to weaken himself.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Harry's dog that begins to howl behind him.

relationships.description: Harry and the Dark Lord are enemies as evident from the message sent by Harry to the Dark Lord.
Dumbledore's action of drinking the potion is related to the Horcrux.
Harry owns Fang, his dog that begins to howl behind him.
